patthana8.37:4.1: Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana8.37:4.3: Nacittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana8.37:5.1: (Paccanīyadukamattāni na vattabbaṃ dhammaṃ pūretuṃ nava nava pañhāni karotu.)
patthana8.37:6.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca … pe … aññamaññe cha … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
